item.title: uniapp postman
item.description: 基础页面 <template> <view class="content"> <input v-model="url" placeholder="请输入请求地址" /> <picker :range="methods" @change="onMethodChange"> <view>{{ methods[selectedIndex] }}</view> </picker> <textarea v-model="body" placeholder="请输入请求体"></textarea> <button @click="sendRequest">发送请求</button> <view v-if="response" class="response"> <text>响应:</text> <pre>{{ response }}</pre> </view> </view> </template> <script> export default { data() { return { url: '', body: '', response: '', methods: ['GET', 'POST'], selectedIndex: 0 }; }, methods: { onMethodChange(e) { this.selectedIndex = e.detail.value; }, sendRequest() { const method = this.methods[this.selectedIndex]; const data = method === 'POST' ?
